oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Business - Neuhoff Packing Company
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The buildings of Neuhoff Packing Company were erected between 1906 and 1950. The complex, located along the Cumberland River near downtown, was abandoned in 1977 when the business was closed. 3 x 4 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Neuhoff Packing Company
Business
Nashville (Tenn.)
